author: ngn
msg: Crappy implementation of isSecure on the control socket as it only checked for the session base SSL filter  (FTPSERVER-149). Same (but opposite) problem for getClientCertificates() (FTPSERVER-151). Also, we should not allow AUTH to be issued on an already secure session or trouble will occur (multiple SSL filters) (FTPSERVER-154) All three fixed and tests added.
